gw.plugin.messaging

Class MessageReply

  • gw.plugin.messaging.MessageReply
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MessagePlugin

    public class MessageReply
implements MessagePlugin
    Reply interface for messaging, used to supply a MessageFinder instance so that integration code can look up and acknowledge a message. The PluginCallbackHandler implementation supplied in initTools() is used to execute a block of code in a Guidewire-initiated transaction. Typically this will be used in conjunction with the MessageFinder instance to look up a message and call reportAck() on it.

    • Method Summary

      Methods

      Supplies an instance of PluginCallbackHandler and MessageFinder to the plugin.
